Package edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.dao

Interface UserGameRepository

All Superinterfaces:
CrudRepository<UserGame,Long>, JpaRepository<UserGame,Long>, ListCrudRepository<UserGame,Long>, ListPagingAndSortingRepository<UserGame,Long>, PagingAndSortingRepository<UserGame,Long>, QueryByExampleExecutor<UserGame>, Repository<UserGame,Long>
public interface UserGameRepository extends JpaRepository<UserGame,Long>
This repository interface is for managing and retrieving data from UserGame as needed.
